name: undecorated
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
An undecorated object or place has nothing added to make it more attractive: She likes plain walls and altogether undecorated surfaces. Undecorated Pavlova can safely be left overnight in the oven, to be decorated in the morning.
UK having no paint or wallpaper on the walls, or not covered with paint or wallpaper: An undecorated, unfurnished flat in the block sold recently for £193,000. The walls of the interior are finished with white plaster, which we have left undecorated.
More examplesFewer examplesIceundecorated cookies with icing and decorate with coloured sugars.Her early clothes tend to be undecorated, but later extravagant accessories became her trademark.I walked into the dining room to find a clean but completely undecorated space.
